extraneous sentence has been omitted as it is a duplicate and does not require additional emphasis through HTML tags. If you intended to include the repeated sentences, they can be formatted in this way: ```html

Apples are red.

The colors of fruits—red, yellow, and green—are also marked up within em elements to draw attention without altering their original meaning as factual information about fruit characteristics.
